b32f2a681c3d92b304557271af079d4f835dd874.subject: Re: URGENT: Cannot access my account
b32f2a681c3d92b304557271af079d4f835dd874.body:
Dear Customer,

Thank you for contacting us. We’ve reviewed your account (ID: cust_1205) and see that it is active and was recently renewed on 2026-01-01.

To help resolve the access issue you’re experiencing, could you please provide a bit more detail?

- Are you unable to log in, or are you receiving an error message?
- Have you tried resetting your password or using the “Forgot password” link?
- If you received an email confirmation, did you click the link within a few minutes as instructed by OpenAI?
- If you have any screenshots or error codes, please share them.

Once we have this information, we’ll be able to troubleshoot further and get you back into your account as quickly as possible.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Support Team

reasons: Account is active and recently renewed
No immediate account status issues detected
Additional details required to diagnose the problem

action_plan.details: Send a professional reply requesting additional information to diagnose the access issue.
